inclusion.criterion: Fabry Registry: All patients with a confirmed diagnosis of Fabry disease who have signed the informed consent and patient authorization form(s) are eligible for leukocyte αGAL (alpha-galactosidase) enzyme activity and/or mutation(s) in the gene coding for αGAL.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Fabry Pregnancy Sub-registry: Eligible women must be enrolled in the Fabry Registry.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Fabry Pregnancy Sub-registry: Eligible women must be pregnant, or have been pregnant with appropriate medical documentation available.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Fabry Pregnancy Sub-registry: Eligible women must provide a signed informed consent and authorization form(s) to participate in the Sub-Registry prior to any Sub-Registry-related data collection being performed.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: The patient is a 47-year-old Asian woman complaining of persistent feelings of sadness.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: She lost interest in activities she used to enjoy.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: She states that her mood is mostly depressed for the past 3 weeks.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: She also lost her appetite, which led to about 5kg weight loss.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: She complains of loss of energy and feelings of worthlessness nearly every day.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: She is not using any drugs and she does not smoke.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: She used to exercise every day for at least 30 min. But she doesn't have enough energy to do so for the past 3 weeks.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: There is nothing remarkable in her past medical history and her drug history is only positive for Vit D3 1000 units daily.
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: Her family history is negative for any psychologic problems.
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

notes: The patient has persistent feelings of sadness, loss of interest in activities, depressed mood for the past 3 weeks, and significant weight loss. She also complains of loss of energy and feelings of worthlessness nearly every day.
